articles.title: 'It was a coup attempt': Hear from ex-GOP official on January 6 insurrection - CNN Video
articles.description: Ahead of Tuesday's critical January 6 hearing, CNN's Miguel Marquez speaks to a Republican official and Wisconsin voters on the importance of the hearings as issues of abortion rights and inflation continue to loom over the country.

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Webb telescope's new images of stars, galaxies and an exoplanet will be revealed today
articles.description: The James Webb Space Telescope's first images will be shared on Tuesday, including a nebula where stars are born, the color spectrum of an exoplanet and the interactions between galaxies.

articles.author: Analysis by Zachary B. Wolf, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: People are talking about Biden's age again
articles.description: The people who wrote the Constitution adopted an age minimum for presidents -- 35 -- but they set no maximum. While the Constitution allows for old presidents, political pundits are increasingly loud about questioning the wisdom of a Joe Biden run for reelect…

articles.author: Nicole Goodkind, CNN Business
articles.title: The euro and the US dollar are at parity for the first time in 20 years
articles.description: For the first time in 20 years, the exchange rate between the euro and the US dollar has reached parity -- meaning the two currencies are worth the same.

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Americans may get the one presidential race the country doesn't want in 2024
articles.description: There's one tiny sliver of hope for Joe Biden in a devastating new poll that flags rising concerns over the President's age and performance and shows even most Democrats want another candidate in 2024. He could still beat Donald Trump.

articles.author: Opinion by Raul A. Reyes
articles.title: Opinion: These GOP Latina candidates are not the 'real deal'
articles.description: The GOP is touting three Latina candidates from Texas: Mayra Flores, Monica De La Cruz and Cassy Garcia. They hold conservative positions on abortion, gun control and immigration, writes Raul Reyes. That's just not where most Latinos are, he says.
articles.content:
Raul A. Reyes is an attorney and a member of the USA Today board of contributors. Follow him on Twitter @RaulAReyes. The opinions expressed in this commentary are his own. View more opinion on CNN.

articles.author: Analysis by Ronald Brownstein
articles.title: Analysis: This may be Democrats' only chance to blunt a red wave in November
articles.description: To avoid the worst-case scenario in November, Democrats must defy one of the most powerful trends shaping modern congressional elections. Recent polls have provided them a glimmer of optimism that they might do just that.
articles.content: (CNN)To avoid the worst-case scenario in November, Democrats must defy one of the most powerful trends shaping modern congressional elections. Recent polls have provided them a glimmer of optimism th… [+14296 chars]

articles.author: Nectar Gan and Emiko Jozuka, CNN
articles.title: Who is Akie Abe? The widow of assassinated Japanese leader Shinzo Abe
articles.description: When Akie Matsuzaki married a rising political aide by the name of Shinzo Abe in 1987, she followed a path well trodden by Japanese wives and gave up her job at the country's largest advertising agency.
articles.content: Tokyo (CNN)When Akie Matsuzaki married Shinzo Abe, then a rising political aide, in 1987, she followed a path well trodden by Japanese wives and gave up her job at the country's largest advertising a… [+6070 chars]

articles.author: Jen Christensen, CNN
articles.title: Biden administration says federal law preempts state abortion bans when emergency care is needed
articles.description: In new clarifying guidance announced Monday, the Biden administration said that federal law preempts state abortion bans when emergency care is needed and that the federal government can penalize institutions or providers that fail to provide abortions as nee…

articles.author: Edward-Isaac Dovere, CNN
articles.title: As worries about Biden in 2024 grow, other Democrats aren't stepping forward
articles.description: A challenge requires a challenger -- and all the Democrats being discussed as potential primary opponents to President Joe Biden tell CNN they're ruling out runs and warning others to follow suit.
